S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-5886 FILE_CANNOT_REMOVE_FILE exception prints garbage.
backported changes #1469505 and #1469923 from trunk to 10.10 branch.
Added new messages to cover cases where no exception was available for the second argument, and made text of those messages more specific to the actual usage. Fixed the calls in RAFContainer.java to be consistent, and still use original error.
